name: PSIBO (itch)
description:
This is PSIBO, a game that unfortunately got put on the backburner for too long, and was eventually canceled.

This version was written entirely from scratch in mid-2019, a few years after the first not-too-great version of the game was released on the Wii U.

Sadly, while the source code was not entirely lost, it seems to inexplicably throw a million errors when attempting to edit it. Though there were updates planned at the time, there likely will be none.

I hope you enjoy this game I made that was seemingly lost to time.
